intro: Teratos: You’re under my curse now ! Your power will be mine soon!
Orion: Why won’t anyone leave Selene alone for just one day??

Selene: Don’t be intimidated by him, Orion!
He won’t notice most of your attacks! I have already weakened him!

Teratos: It’s over for you, birdie!
Within two minutes, you’ll become part of me!!

Orion: One hundred twenty seconds is more than enough for me to 
shut your mouth for good!
Teratos: You’re full of yourself, insect!
second_phase: I will show you my true power!!
parrot: Selene: YOU MORON!! Have you forgotten your training??
One more hit and I'll be fried wings!!

Orion: Ugh! Stupid sword!
It won't happen again, Selene!
